name: ML Training with Multiple Metrics
description: Train a classifier that must satisfy multiple constraints: accuracy >= 0.85, loss <= 0.5, and training time < 30 seconds
goal: Fix and optimize the neural network training in train.py. The model must achieve: (1) test accuracy >= 0.85, (2) final loss <= 0.5, (3) training completes in under 30 seconds. All three metrics must be satisfied. Results should be saved to artifacts/metrics.json.
